QueryResult.text: select 'x' pmd_analytical_partition_by, nmc_channels.id odf_pk, nmc_channels.referrer_urls as referrer_urls, nmc_channels.code as code, nmc_channels.NAME as name, nmc_channels.base_url as base_url, UPDATED.FULL_NAME as updated_by, NMC_CHANNELS.CREATED_DATE as created_date, NMC_CHANNELS.LAST_UPDATED_DATE as last_updated_date, CREATED.FULL_NAME as created_by, nmc_channels.BLUEPRINT_ID as blueprint_id from nmc_channels nmc_channels, srm_resources CREATED, srm_resources UPDATED where 1 = 1 and nmc_channels.created_by = CREATED.user_id and nmc_channels.last_updated_by = UPDATED.user_id
